import React,{useEffect}from'react';function SameColor(_ref){var isSamePage=_ref.isSamePage;var init=function init(){//顏色字串
var colorStr='';function color(){var r=function r(){return Math.floor(Math.random()*256);};return colorStr='rgb('+r()+','+r()+','+r()+')';}var Height=window.screen.height*0.8;var Width=window.screen.width;var ulHeight=(Height-110)/8;var ulWidth=Width*0.9;var liWidth=ulWidth*0.9/8;//ul
for(var i=1;i<9;i++){var ul=document.createElement('ul');document.querySelector('.SameColor').appendChild(ul).style.width=ulWidth+'px';}//li 
for(var j=0;j<8;j++){var x=document.querySelectorAll('ul');for(var k=0;k<x.length;k++){var li=document.createElement('li');document.querySelector('.SameColor').querySelectorAll('ul')[k].appendChild(li).style.height=ulHeight+'px';document.querySelector('.SameColor').querySelectorAll('ul')[k].appendChild(li).style.width=liWidth+'px';}}//color Array
var colorArray=[];var liNumber=document.querySelectorAll('li').length;for(var l=0;l<liNumber/2;l++){color();colorArray.push(colorStr);}//1~32
var A=new Array(32);var arr=[];for(var _i=0;_i<32;_i++){arr[_i]=_i;}function ans(){var x;for(var _i2=1;_i2<33;_i2++){//這邊記得要用 -i，元素每取走一個，就少一個。
x=Math.floor(Math.random()*(34-_i2));A[_i2-1]=arr.splice(x,1);}return A;}ans();for(var _i3=0;_i3<=31;_i3++){var value=A[_i3];var num=value[0];if(num){document.querySelector('.SameColor').querySelectorAll('li')[num].style.backgroundColor=colorArray[num];}}for(var _j=32;_j<=63;_j++){var _value=A[_j-32];var _num=_value[0];if(_num){document.querySelector('.SameColor').querySelectorAll('li')[_j].style.backgroundColor=colorArray[_num];}}};useEffect(function(){init();},[]);return React.createElement("div",{className:"SameColor",style:{display:isSamePage?'block':'none'}});}export default SameColor;
